title: Alphabet Inc. Cl A stock falls Thursday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       slid 1.82% to $136.39 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.03% to 37,440.34 and the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.34% to 4,688.68. Alphabet Inc. Cl A closed $6.29 short of its 52-week high ($142.68), which the company achieved on December 26th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       fell 0.72% to $367.94, Amazon.com Inc. 
        AMZN,
        +0.31%
       fell 2.63% to $144.57, and Meta Platforms Inc. 
        META,
        -1.68%
       rose 0.77% to $347.12. Trading volume (25.7 M) remained 4.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 30.3 M.
